title: black creen after champ select
body: I can log in perfectly and get into any game mode without a problem. But as soon as champ select is over and "League of Legends" comes up, it pulls the whole "there is a problem with the connection". I have tried relogging many times and I even did the launcher patch in the settings for the launcher. This has made me very mad because I ended up being demoted due to my absence in the game being counted as a "leave"

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having some problems getting a solid connection to the game server you were going to be playing on. It's not entirely uncommon to be unable to reach specific servers while your internet is working fine, and most of the time you simply need to update a few of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) or firewall settings.
